name: Atomic Reach
overview:
Atomic Reach is a social publishing platform that connects companies and brands looking for high-quality content with the people who create great content every day.

A growing number of companies are looking for high-quality content to attract and engage consumers, as well as build awareness and brand relevance.

Creating relevant and interesting content internally, however, can be a challenge due to a lack of resources or expertise. Atomic Reach solves this predicament by providing companies with a new way to deliver high-quality content from a variety of sources focused on their brand, product or industry.

Through the use of our innovative social publishing platform, companies can create information hubs on their websites that consumers will want to visit on a regular basis rather than just when they have a specific need.

By displaying relevant, interesting and engaging content from bloggers and other sources, Atomic Reach’s social publishing platform helps companies build stronger relationships with consumers.
